title: Horns Down, Toilets Up | Daily Best of September 8 | Rick & Bubba
description:
After a surprise delivery, we may have a solution for the long walk to the bathroom at our new studios. Speaking of toilets, Bubba got some interesting features added to his home. In sports, as Alabama prepares to take on Texas this weekend, Coach Nick Saban learns it will be a 15-yard penalty if a player shows the "horns down" hand sign. In politics, Obama says the country is better off since Biden took office. And lastly, Memphis is in shock after a string of horrific shootings perpetrated by a man who was streaming it all live online.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
